title: Tureen With Lid And Stand, 1760s–80s
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2008: acquired by Museum
dimensions:
H x W x D (a,b,c: overall): 23.5 x 41 x 30 cm (9 1/4 x 16 1/8 x 11 13/16 in.)
H x W x D (a: tureen): 38 x 28 cm (14 15/16 in. x 11 in.)
H x W x D (b: lid): 36 x 26 cm (14 3/16 x 10 1/4 in.)
H x W x D (c: stand): 39.5 x 30 cm (15 9/16 x 11 13/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Oval tureen (a) with stepped domed lid (b) having shaped edge and center knop; oval stand (c) with shaped edge; all with white ground decorated with ochre flowers and foliage; narrow band along edges of cover and stand.

tombstone.epitaph: Tureen With Lid And Stand, 1760s–80s.Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2008-40-7-a/c.
